question: Which of the following department was called as Diwan-i-unzarat during the reign of Balban?
explanation: Balban who ruled the Delhi sultanate from 1266 CE to 1286 CE. Balban was undoubtedly one of the main architects of the Delhi Sultanate. He separated the Finance Department also called as Diwan-i-unzarat from the Diwan-i-Arz (Military Department).
